title: #Forfeit
description: Getting divorced at twenty-five sucksTeaching over-confident rich kids when you're all but homeless sucks. In fact, every single aspect of Daisy Fitzgerald’s life is one big…#failEnter Xander, a Knight-in-Shining-Cricket-Pads, who knocks her off her wedge heels and into his privileged world of It-girls, players and Michelin stars.High on cocktails & escapismDaisy agrees to play Forfeit, the ultimate game of dares. A simple kiss dare ignites her relationship with Xander, but the game's called Forfeit for good reason. Can they survive three rounds?Blackmail • Betrayal • Revenge Move over Gatsby, there's a new bunch of bored young things in town.
author: Caroline Batten
